com.vorlonsoft.android.rate

Class DefaultDialogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vorlonsoft.android.rate.DefaultDialogManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DialogManager

    public class DefaultDialogManager
extends Object
implements DialogManager

    DefaultDialogManager Class - default dialog manager class implements DialogManager interface of the AndroidRate library. You can extends it and use AppRate.with(this).setDialogManagerFactory(DialogManager.Factory)] if you want to use fully custom dialog (from support library etc.). DefaultDialogManager Class is thread-safe and a fast singleton implementation inside library, not outside (protected, not private constructor).

    Since:
    1.0.2
    Version:
    1.1.9
    Author:
    Alexander Savin, Antoine Vianey
